quoteTitle: Do not dwell in the past, do not dream of the future, concentrate the mind on the present moment.
author: Buddha

quoteTitle: Be the change that you wish to see in the world.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quoteTitle: Arise, awake, and stop not till the goal is reached.
author: Swami Vivekananda

quoteTitle: You cannot shake hands with a clenched fist.
author: Indira Gandhi

quoteTitle: The highest education is that which does not merely give us information but makes our life in harmony with all existence.
author: Rabindranath Tagore

quoteTitle: The best way  to lose yourself in the service of others.
author: Vivekananda
